alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Mainland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:18PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern St. Lucie, northern Okeechobee and Indian River Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 116 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from near Blue Cypress Lake to Basinger, Fort Pierce, and Sebastian, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce, Sebastian, Vero Beach, Fellsmere and Indian River Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These types of funnel clouds are harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
